```{r}
bt <- function(link, label, icon){
  bt_ccs <- downloadthis::download_link(
  link = link,
  button_label = label,
  button_type = "default",
  has_icon = TRUE,
  icon = icon,
  self_contained = FALSE,
  button_size = "small",
  class = "button"
  ) 
  shiny::HTML(gsub("\n", "", as.character(bt_ccs)))
}
```
